# Timeline

The following Gantt chart outlines the planned timeline for the various components of the PhD project over a 36-month period.

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=8, dpi=300, fig.align="center", out.width="100%"}
library(dplyr)
library(plan)

g <- new("gantt")

# Helper dates
proj_start <- "2025-10-01"
proj_end   <- "2028-09-30"

# ---- Systematic literature reviews ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Protocol",                    "2025-10-01", "2026-01-15", done = 100)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Dalbavancin review",          "2026-02-01", "2026-06-30", done = 95)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Beta-lactams review",         "2026-04-01", "2026-12-31", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Other antibiotics review",    "2027-10-01", "2027-12-15", done = 0)

# ---- Model reconstruction & harmonization ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Reconstruct dalbavancin models", "2026-05-01", "2026-09-30", done = 90)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Reconstruct beta-lactam models", "2026-08-01", "2027-06-30", done = 0)

# ---- Shiny apps & tooling ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Shiny UI components",         "2026-06-01", "2026-10-31", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Dalbavancin Shiny",           "2026-09-01", "2027-02-28", done = 95)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Beta-lactams Shiny",          "2027-01-15", "2027-10-31", done = 0)

# ---- External validation ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "External validation: dalbavancin", "2027-01-01", "2027-06-30", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "External validation: beta-lactams","2027-05-01", "2028-02-28", done = 0)

# ---- Dissemination & thesis writing ----
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Manuscript 1 (review)",                 "2026-10-01", "2027-03-31", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Manuscript 2 (external validation)",    "2027-07-01", "2028-02-28", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Manuscript 3 (tool + implementation)",  "2028-01-01", "2028-08-31", done = 0)
g <- ganttAddTask(g, "Thesis (write/revise/submit)",          "2028-06-01", "2028-09-30", done = 0)

# ---- Plot ----
plot(
  g,
  xlim = as.Date(c(proj_start, proj_end)),
  ylab = "",                         # <- shorter than any title: remove it
  main = "PhD Timeline (36 months)"
)

# Project start/end markers
abline(v = as.Date(proj_start), lty = 2)
abline(v = as.Date(proj_end),   lty = 2)
mtext("Start", side = 3, at = as.Date(proj_start), line = 0.2, cex = 0.8)
mtext("End",   side = 3, at = as.Date(proj_end),   line = 0.2, cex = 0.8)

legend(
  x = 1, y = 1.1,                  # 1 = right edge, >1 = above plot
  xjust = 1, yjust = 1,
  pch = 22, pt.cex = 2, cex = 0.9,
  pt.bg = gray(c(0.3, 0.9)),
  border = "black",
  legend = c("Completed", "Not yet done"),
  bg = "white",
  xpd = NA                         # allow drawing in margins
)
```
